tests.query:
--
-- Test for various ALTER statements
--

-- clean-up in case a prior regression run failed
SET client_min_messages TO 'warning'
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS sepgsql_test_regression_1
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS sepgsql_test_regression
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: DROP USER IF EXISTS regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: RESET client_min_messages
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- @SECURITY-CONTEXT=unconfined_u:unconfined_r:sepgsql_regtest_superuser_t:s0

--
-- CREATE Objects to be altered (with debug_audit being silent)
--
CREATE DATABASE sepgsql_test_regression_1
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE USER regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE SCHEMA regtest_schema_1
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE SCHEMA regtest_schema_2
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA regtest_schema_1 TO public
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA regtest_schema_2  TO public
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: SET search_path = regtest_schema_1, regtest_schema_2, public
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE regtest_table_1 (a int, b text)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE regtest_table_2 (c text) inherits (regtest_table_1)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE regtest_table_3 (x int primary key, y text)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
---
-- partitioned table parent
CREATE TABLE regtest_ptable_1 (o int, p text) PARTITION BY RANGE (o)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- partitioned table children
CREATE TABLE regtest_ptable_1_ones PARTITION OF regtest_ptable_1 FOR VALUES FROM ('0') TO ('10')
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE regtest_ptable_1_tens PARTITION OF regtest_ptable_1 FOR VALUES FROM ('10') TO ('100')
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
---

CREATE SEQUENCE regtest_seq_1
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE VIEW regtest_view_1 AS SELECT * FROM regtest_table_1 WHERE a > 0
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
CREATE FUNCTION regtest_func_1 (text) RETURNS bool
  AS 'BEGIN RETURN true; END' LANGUAGE 'plpgsql'
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- switch on debug_audit
SET sepgsql.debug_audit = true
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: SET client_min_messages = LOG
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
--
-- ALTER xxx OWNER TO
--
-- XXX: It should take db_xxx:{setattr} permission checks even if
--      owner is not actually changed.
--
ALTER DATABASE sepgsql_test_regression_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER DATABASE sepgsql_test_regression_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER SCHEMA regtest_schema_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER SCHEMA regtest_schema_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable_1_ones OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER SEQUENCE regtest_seq_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER SEQUENCE regtest_seq_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER VIEW regtest_view_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER VIEW regtest_view_1 OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER FUNCTION regtest_func_1(text) OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER FUNCTION regtest_func_1(text) OWNER TO regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
--
-- ALTER xxx SET SCHEMA
--
ALTER TABLE regtest_table_1 SET SCHEMA regtest_schema_2
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable_1 SET SCHEMA regtest_schema_2
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable_1_ones SET SCHEMA regtest_schema_2
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER SEQUENCE regtest_seq_1 SET SCHEMA regtest_schema_2
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER VIEW regtest_view_1 SET SCHEMA regtest_schema_2
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER FUNCTION regtest_func_1(text) SET SCHEMA regtest_schema_2
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
--
-- ALTER xxx RENAME TO
--
ALTER DATABASE sepgsql_test_regression_1 RENAME TO sepgsql_test_regression
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER SCHEMA regtest_schema_1 RENAME TO regtest_schema
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_1 RENAME TO regtest_table
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
---
-- partitioned table parent
ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable_1 RENAME TO regtest_ptable
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- partitioned table child
ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable_1_ones RENAME TO regtest_table_part
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
---

ALTER SEQUENCE regtest_seq_1 RENAME TO regtest_seq
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER VIEW regtest_view_1 RENAME TO regtest_view
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER FUNCTION regtest_func_1(text) RENAME TO regtest_func
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: SET search_path = regtest_schema, regtest_schema_2, public
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
--
-- misc ALTER commands
--
ALTER DATABASE sepgsql_test_regression CONNECTION LIMIT 999
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER DATABASE sepgsql_test_regression SET search_path TO regtest_schema, public
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported yet

ALTER TABLE regtest_table ADD COLUMN d float
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table DROP COLUMN d
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table ALTER b SET DEFAULT 'abcd'
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported yet
ALTER TABLE regtest_table ALTER b SET DEFAULT 'XYZ'
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported yet
ALTER TABLE regtest_table ALTER b DROP DEFAULT
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported yet
ALTER TABLE regtest_table ALTER b SET NOT NULL
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table ALTER b DROP NOT NULL
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table ALTER b SET STATISTICS -1
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table ALTER b SET (n_distinct = 999)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table ALTER b SET STORAGE PLAIN
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table ADD CONSTRAINT test_fk FOREIGN KEY (a) REFERENCES regtest_table_3(x)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported
ALTER TABLE regtest_table ADD CONSTRAINT test_ck CHECK (b like '%abc%') NOT VALID
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported
ALTER TABLE regtest_table VALIDATE CONSTRAINT test_ck
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported
ALTER TABLE regtest_table DROP CONSTRAINT test_ck
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported

CREATE TRIGGER regtest_test_trig BEFORE UPDATE ON regtest_table
    FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE suppress_redundant_updates_trigger()
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table DISABLE TRIGGER regtest_test_trig
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table ENABLE  TRIGGER regtest_test_trig
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: CREATE RULE regtest_test_rule AS ON INSERT TO regtest_table_3 DO ALSO NOTHING
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_3 DISABLE RULE regtest_test_rule
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_3 ENABLE RULE regtest_test_rule
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table SET (fillfactor = 75)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table RESET (fillfactor)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_2 NO INHERIT regtest_table
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported
ALTER TABLE regtest_table_2 INHERIT regtest_table
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported
ALTER TABLE regtest_table SET TABLESPACE pg_default
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
---
-- partitioned table parent
ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ADD COLUMN d float
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable DROP COLUMN d
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ALTER p SET DEFAULT 'abcd'
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ALTER p SET DEFAULT 'XYZ'
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ALTER p DROP DEFAULT
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ALTER p SET NOT NULL
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ALTER p DROP NOT NULL
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ALTER p SET STATISTICS -1
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ALTER p SET (n_distinct = 999)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ALTER p SET STORAGE PLAIN
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable ADD CONSTRAINT test_ck CHECK (p like '%abc%') NOT VALID
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable DROP CONSTRAINT test_ck
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql

ALTER TABLE regtest_ptable SET TABLESPACE pg_default
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- partitioned table child
ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ALTER p SET DEFAULT 'abcd'
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ALTER p SET DEFAULT 'XYZ'
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ALTER p DROP DEFAULT
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ALTER p SET NOT NULL
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ALTER p DROP NOT NULL
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ALTER p SET STATISTICS -1
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ALTER p SET (n_distinct = 999)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ALTER p SET STORAGE PLAIN
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ADD CONSTRAINT test_ck CHECK (p like '%abc%') NOT VALID
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part VALIDATE CONSTRAINT test_ck
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql
ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part DROP CONSTRAINT test_ck
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
-- not supported by sepgsql

CREATE TRIGGER regtest_part_test_trig BEFORE UPDATE ON regtest_table_part
    FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE suppress_redundant_updates_trigger()
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part DISABLE TRIGGER regtest_part_test_trig
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part ENABLE  TRIGGER regtest_part_test_trig
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part SET (fillfactor = 75)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part RESET (fillfactor)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE regtest_table_part SET TABLESPACE pg_default
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
---

ALTER VIEW regtest_view SET (security_barrier)
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: ALTER SEQUENCE regtest_seq INCREMENT BY 10 START WITH 1000
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query:
--
-- clean-up objects
--
RESET sepgsql.debug_audit
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: RESET client_min_messages
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: DROP DATABASE sepgsql_test_regression
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: DROP SCHEMA regtest_schema CASCADE
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: DROP SCHEMA regtest_schema_2 CASCADE
tests.name: alter.sql

tests.query: DROP USER regress_sepgsql_test_user
tests.name: alter.sql
